message.entry: The input COCO JSON file must contain the "images" field.
The input COCO JSON file must contain the "annotations" field.
The input COCO JSON file must contain the "categories" field.
The input COCO JSON file must contain the "file_name" key-value pair under the "images" field.
Invalid "annotations" field in input COCO JSON file. A valid "annotations" field must contain either the "segmentation" or "bbox" key-value pair.
Invalid "categories" field in input COCO JSON file. A valid "categories" field must contain the "id", "name", and "supercategory" key-value pairs.
Invalid polygon format. Polygon data must be stored in [x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN] format.
Invalid rectangle format. Rectangle data must be stored in [x, y, width, height] format.
